amendment.description: To provide for immigration injunction reform.

action.text: Amendment SA 4577 ruled out of order by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 4577.
Amendment SA 4577 proposed by Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 4556. (consideration: CR S7326-7327; text: CR S7326-7327) To provide for immigration injunction reform.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4577 proposed by Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 4556.
